name: SUMEDIAN
description: MEDIAN filter about a user-defined polygonal curve with the distance along the curve specified by key header word

parameter_descriptions.xshift: Array of position values as specified by the 'key' parameter
parameter_descriptions.nshift: Number of x,t values defining median times
parameter_descriptions.xfile: File containing position values as specified by the 'key' parameter
parameter_descriptions.key: Key header word specifying trace number (=offset to use trace offset instead)
parameter_descriptions.mix: Array of weights for mix (weighted moving average)
parameter_descriptions.tmpdir: Directory path prefix for storing temporary files
